channel.title: CVE Feed for Kaspersky -- Kaspersky Security for Linux Mail Server 8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kaspersky -- Kaspersky Security for Linux Mail Server 8

item.title: CVE-2024-1619|2024-02-29T09:22:03.588Z -- Kaspersky -- Kaspersky Security for Linux Mail Server 8
item.description: Kaspersky has fixed a security issue in the Kaspersky Security 8.0 for Linux Mail Server. The issue was that an attacker could potentially force an administrator to click on a malicious link to perform unauthorized actions.
